abstract: Friends currently has a handful of very good suggestive dance-punk and indie-pop songs, but they seem capable of eccentricities and power down the line.
snippet: Friends currently has a handful of very good suggestive dance-punk and indie-pop songs, but they seem capable of eccentricities and power down the line.
lead_paragraph: So much of what's on offer at CMJ is raw material - maybe the band's got it all figured out, more likely it doesn't. If it doesn't work, maybe it'll try again next year. Maybe it'll reinvent itself, or break up and reconfigure before trying again.

headline.main: In Friends' Suggestive Notes, Hints of Future Power
